Cool nursery rhymes with drawings by Wallace Tripp

26 February 2007

AbeBooks is the best place to buy Wallace Tripp books. The books are out of print but worth looking for. You can get a sense for them from Amazon.[1] [2] You can see the reviews but not the artwork. This site has the artwork. These are the best books:

  • Sir Toby Jingle's beastly journey
  • A Great Big Ugly Man Came Up and Tied His Horse to Me
  • Granfa' Grig Had a Pig
